description.message: A Chromium extension designed to dim or change the color tone of websites.

onHelp.message: Turn on the screen dimmer for this website.

onDisabledHelp.message: Unfortunately, due to browser limitations, this website cannot be dimmed.

globalHelp.message: Use global settings that apply to all websites with this option enabled.

opacityHelp.message: Adjust the intensity of the screen dimming overlay.

resetWebsiteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to reset the settings for this website?

resetAllConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to reset the settings for all websites?
